If anyone hads these after FEC can you confirm that I take these from tomorrow morning and not from tonight? Thanks in advance! Kirstie
Posts.Title: Dexamethasone following FEC

Posts.Content: I'm through my third Taxotere and have had 10 days of injections after each one. I too was very apprehensive at first. On the first day my friend came round who's a district nurse simply to tell me what on earth to do (mine go in to my tummy) . She advised and I did, then from then on, I've been fine doing them. A couple of suggestions, at first I found it easier looking in the mirror as I did it for some reason it felt easier that way, like it wasn't my tummy or something! Also a good bit of advice my friend gave was to change sides of your tummy each day too. Whilst chemo brain doesn't allow me to always remember which sides I injected into the day before (!) I'm sure it works out 'fair'! Once you've done it 3-4 times, itt becomes easy to do. I wish you all the best with it! Kirstie
